Teresa Palmer
=============

[City Council](https://www.willowparktx.gov/Directory.aspx?DID=19)
Title: Mayor
[email](https://www.willowparktx.gov/formcenter/Email-Forms-5/Email-Mayor-Teresa-Palmer-50)

Teresa Palmer was elected Mayor in 2025 and is the highest-ranking official in Willow Park. With an impressive 40-year career as a financial advisor, Teresa brings a wealth of experience and insight to her role. She owns her own financial firm with her oldest son and has proudly called Willow Park home for 34 years. As a devoted mother, Teresa has three sons, ages 43, 41 and 32, all happily married. She delights in being a grandmother to a beautiful 10-year-old granddaughter. Teresa is deeply committed to the preservation and well-being of Willow Park and continues to serve the community with dedication and passion.
